snippet: Medicare said that it planned to make available detailed information on what it pays individual physicians as soon as next week, despite the long-term resistance by the American Medical Association.
abstract: Medicare says that it plans to make available to consumers and others detailed information on what it pays individual physicians, despite the long-term resistance by the American Medical Assn and other groups.
lead_paragraph: Medicare said that it planned to make available detailed information on what it pays individual physicians as soon as next week, despite the long-term resistance by the American Medical Association.

headline.main: Medicare to Share Information on Pay for Physicians
headline.print_headline: Medicare to Share Information on Pay for Physicians
